page.title: 18ECOLOGY/OPEN LAND
page.content: The area,although heavily residential, has open land which is accessible to the public.For{recreation},there are small playing fields and open grassland.This includes{Freemantle {Common}near Bitterne and a large playing field for sports situated in Hightown.There are no big country parks(although two are within easy reach by car)but there are some small pieces of land for the public's needs. {Miller's Pond} is a natural wetland area in Sholing which may eventually suffer residential development but local people have produced a petition against this.The council have just made footpaths through the Miller's Pond area.The recent landscape work around the {Bitterne Bypass}has done much to enhance the area known locally as "Hum Hole".
